title: Some People Actually Think GP is Permanently Disabled

replies.body: He is, because everybody complained too much about him announcing so Rito figured that the community didn't love him enough to keep him around. The LoL community has only themselves to blame.

I don't sense any sarcasm...

So, lemme tell you why thats bullshit :) 

GP's rework was one of the most anticipated in a long while. Even if what you claim is true, months of work were put into that rework, so they would never even think of actually removing him. Doesn't make sense from a game play or business perspective.
